directions: Puree ingredients together in blender until smooth. Serve over salad greens.
ingredients: 1/2 (10 ounce) jar Dickinson's® Pacific Mountain® Pure Strawberry Preserves or Dickinson's® Pacific Mountain® Pure Seedless Strawberry Preserves
1 cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing, any brand (not balsamic vinegar)
title: Strawberry Balsamic Dressing
